name: Press Axe
description:
The Game Was Also Created to Hurt Certain People.


Press Axe is part of a B-Game that I created to capture everything I like. I wanted to praise the games that were once popular and to reinterpret Bennett Foddy's philosophy in my own way. It's actually a game where you drag the mouse and throw the axe.

Why did I make this game? Time to get out of bed, modern classics that tickle your ears, piles of written code and cats, and even lovely rubber duck. I found out that a game was created that could harm people even though I just put my favorite things together. Take time to look back on your life by climbing objects that contain my wishlist to the fullest.

Modern Classic Presented by Chris Zabriskie and Kevin MacLeod


We've prepared a two-hour piano solo that's monotonous and entertains your interests and achievements. Once again, I would like to thank the two composers for making all this music available.

  • Throw a difficult double-edged axe to the top.
  • There are challenges ready to frustrate you.
  • Relax while listening to classical music during the game.
  • Constantly lose what you've accomplished.
  • Find the rubber duck hidden here and there on the map.

New Stages and Various Functions Will Be Updated.
